snippet.title: Card Shark | Trailer [GOG]
snippet.description:
✅ Link to the game 👉  https://bit.ly/3M9xzur

Card Shark is an adventure game full of cunning, intrigue, and delectable deceit. Enter a world where you’ll need to play your opponents better than you play your cards. Cheat your way to the top of 18th-century French society. Master deceptions using card marking, false shuffles, deck switching, false deals, and more! Use your ill-gotten gains to buy your way into the closed world of high-stakes tables.

Follow us on:
Web: 👉  https://bit.ly/3rpVmMh
Twitch: 👉  https://bit.ly/3vVI6CJ
Twitter: 👉  https://bit.ly/3fdOUFK
Facebook: 👉  https://bit.ly/2NWKVCw
